document_data.name: ''Headband of Focus''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Headband of Focus''''' was a unique circlet associated with the faith of [[Nobanion]].
document_data.Description: The headband was made of [[gold]]-colored [[silk]]. Along the length of the band were stylized depictions of [[lion]]s.
document_data.Powers: It bestowed upon its wearer improved skill in unarmed combat. Additionally, it allowed them to attain ''[[draw upon holy might|divine strength, speed, and fortitude]]'', for a limited duration of time.
document_data.History:
The ''Headband of Focus'' was crafted by a devour follower of Nobanion. During its crafting, they focused upon Lord Fireman's teachings and entered into a state of meditation. Upon its completion, they realized the headband had unique properties, bestowed upon it by Nobanion himself.

By the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, it had come into the possession of the unscrupulous fence [[Waizahb]].
